alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 4:13PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Umatilla County through 445 PM PDT... At 412 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northern Umatilla Reservation, or 16 miles northeast of Pendleton, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Milton-Freewater, Athena, Weston, Adams, Umapine and northern Umatilla Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
